message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $120.  It's a steal you won't want to miss!
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $90.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $110. It's a high-quality product that I know you'd appreciate.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Alice. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product.
